components.description:
One, two, or three green olives, either pitted or sprouting from a branch. Some platforms show a solitary pitted green olive stuffed with a piece of a pimento pepper.

Can be used to talk about olives or the color green.
components.title: Olive

version.description:
Unicode 13.0 is the version of the Unicode Standard released on March 10, 2020. 55 new emoji code points were added in this release, with all 117 new emojis for 2020 (including sequences for gender and skin tone) listed under Emoji 13.0.

  • ðŸ”£ Unicode 13.0.0 Specification

More about what's new in Unicode 13.0.

apple_vendor_description: The olive emoji on Apple devices presents a single, ripe olive, rendered with a deep, lustrous green color and a subtle sheen that highlights its smooth, plump shape. Apple's characteristic 3D shading and realistic lighting give it a tactile quality, suggesting its natural texture. This emoji, with its distinctively rendered appearance on Apple devices, is often used to represent Mediterranean cuisine, healthy eating, or as a symbol of peace and tranquility.
